summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of February 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance of the account, highlighting significant transactions made during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Edward Hinckley
persons.context: Edward Hinckley is mentioned as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

events.description: A cash transfer of $250,000 was credited to Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $85,096 was made to Sabadell United Bank.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document details account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for February 2016.
The ending balance of Epstein's account as of February 29, 2016, was $208,388.76.
Significant outgoing transfers included $15,364.00 to an unspecified recipient and $85,096.00 to Sabadell United Bank.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
There are multiple mentions of outgoing money transfers, indicating active financial transactions during this period.
